name: Arva AI
headline: AI enabled business verification for banks and fintechs
description:
Every time a business onboards onto a bank or fintech a human analyst has to conduct manual document verification. We replace those human KYB (know your business) analysts with AI agents that handle cases in seconds, not days.

Currently, 30% of know your business (KYB) cases result in manual review work. With Arva's AI agents the whole end-to-end onboarding experience is automated. Instant onboarding whilst reducing operational costs by 80%.

Our end goal is to have a whole suite of AI workers that can handle manual compliance work for banks and fintechs. A $24B opportunity in the US alone.

founders.name: Rhim Shah, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Formerly led the FinCrime product team at Revolut Business and multiple product teams at Jobandtalent. Prior to that an APM intern at Google. Studied Engineering at the University of Oxford.

founders.name: Oli Wales, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Formerly lead product engineer at Opvia (YC S20), before that a full-stack engineer at Iventis, Chimnie and The Trade Desk. Studied Computer Science at the University of Cambridge.

# AI enabled business
# AI enabled business verification
# verification for
# for
##### Automate 80% of your manual compliance tasks for faster and more compliant AML and KYB checks
[Book a demo](https://www.arva.ai/<https:/calendar.app.google/uf3hRNTZnFdxcG4bA>)
[Book a demo](https://www.arva.ai/<https:/calendar.app.google/uf3hRNTZnFdxcG4bA>)

Backed by
![Logo](https://framerusercontent.com/assets/UL6oeChM4wC4qYrKJwrZRQedI8.png)
###### KEY FEATURES
## A suite of AI enabled checks for stronger and faster business verification
###### **Deep online due diligence**
Request less information from your good customers by enriching KYB checks with deep online data whilst accurately spotting fraudsters and adverse media with AI
###### **Website analysis**
AI agents that conduct advanced analysis of websites to understand business activities and detect fraudsters on an ongoing basis
###### **Document intelligence**
Vision AI for document fraudster detection combined with information extraction to simplify the processing of bank statements, formation documents, ownership structure documents and more
###### **Realtime communication**
Live feedback to customers as they’re onboarding to reduce the back and forth with information requests
###### **Data enrichment**
Enrich Arva’s checks with business registry data from 150 different countries, to ensure you can onboard globally with just an entity name
###### **And more…**
Case management, AI driven screening, orchestration, KYC integrations, advanced risk engine and more
[Explore Features](https://www.arva.ai/<./features>)

###### WHY ARVA
## Faster and stronger
## Faster and stronger
Slow customer onboarding costs fintechs $10 Billion in lost revenue annually, that shouldn't be you
Slow customer onboarding costs fintechs $10 Billion in lost revenue annually, that shouldn't be you
###### **Frictionless verification**
Handle cases in seconds with real-time feedback as your customer is onboarding, frictionless and fast
###### **Strengthen compliance**
Strengthen compliance controls using AI to detect fraudsters that even human analysts would miss
###### **80% less manual work**
Automate your low to medium risk manual reviews with Arva, focus on high risk investigations
###### **Auditable**
All results and decisions are auditable and stored in an audit log
###### **Scalable**
Handle cases perfectly in parallel, instantly scale up or down with volume, no need to outsource
###### **Easy integration**
Setup is lightening fast, use the manual interface or our developer first API

###### PRIVACY & SECURITY
## Enterprise grade security
We take privacy, security and data seriously
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/AJxNfzkTPUWkdQ2NXjZYgKoJc.png)
###### **SOC 2 Type II Certified**
Explore our [Trust Center](https://www.arva.ai/<https:/arva.trust.site/>) to see how our SOC 2 Type II compliance safeguards your data with industry-leading security standards
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/q4phcOoqa3cEgT1unQimLk9xiGo.svg)
###### **Auditability of all results**
Every result is fully logged, giving you a clear and traceable record for complete transparency and auditability
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wVrs2J4WM34DdITyqSGpFHdrA.svg)
###### **Built with regulation in mind**
Our platform is designed by compliance experts to meet regulatory standards, strengthening your compliance controls

generated_description:
### Arva AI: Transforming Business Verification Through AI

Founded in 2024 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S24, Arva AI is on a mission to revolutionize how banks and fintechs handle business verification. By deploying AI agents to automate the know your business (KYB) verification process, Arva achieves what once took human analysts days in just seconds.

#### The Problem
Traditionally, onboarding a business at a bank or fintech involved meticulous manual document checks, resulting in operational delays and ballooning costs. Approximately 30% of these KYB cases ended up needing further manual review, straining resources and increasing the risk of human error.

#### The Solution
Enter Arva AI. They offer a suite of AI-enabled tools designed to automate nearly the entire onboarding process. This not only speeds up the experience—resulting in **instant onboarding** for businesses—but also reduces operational costs by approximately **80%**. The potential market opportunity is significant, with estimates of a **$24 billion** market in the U.S. alone.

#### Key Features
1. **Deep Online Due Diligence:** Enhances KYB checks with rich online data, minimizing the need for excessive information.
2. **Website Analysis:** Continuous monitoring allows for the detection of fraudulent activities through automated website assessments.
3. **Document Intelligence:** Vision AI assists in identifying document fraud while simplifying data processing.
4. **Real-time Customer Communication:** Builds a more efficient onboarding experience by reducing information back-and-forth.
5. **Global Data Enrichment:** Accesses business registry data from over 150 countries, allowing for seamless international onboarding.

#### Why Arva?
With slow customer onboarding costing the fintech industry an estimated **$10 billion** in lost revenue annually, Arva empowers companies to operationalize compliance while focusing on high-risk investigations rather than drowning in paperwork. Features such as auditable results, scalability, and easy integration via a developer-friendly API set Arva apart in the compliance landscape.

#### Team & Funding
Currently a compact team of three, Arva AI is led by group partner Gustaf Alstromer, and has garnered early support, including a **$3 million** investment from Google's early-stage AI fund.

The future is clear for Arva AI: automate compliance processes extensively and make business verification not just faster, but smarter. If you’re looking to enhance your onboarding experience while drastically cutting costs, you might want to [book a demo with Arva AI](https://www.arva.ai/<https:/calendar.app.google/uf3hRNTZnFdxcG4bA>) to see it in action.

For more information, check out their website at [arva.ai](https://www.arva.ai).
